text: kaho, "vah isakee saamarthy rakhata hai ki tumapar tumhaare oopar se ya tumhaare pairon ke neeche se koee yaatana bhej de ya tumhen toliyon mein baantakar paraspar bhida de aur ek ko doosare kee ladaee ka maza chakhae." dekho, ham aayaton ko kaise, tarah-tarah se, bayaan karate hai, taaki ve samajhe
